review: I bought it because my wife has an IPAD and needed to connect it to the TV.  It works right out of the box. In addition to being able to stream from your devise, it offers many channels of programming that you can choose from.NOTE: This devise can only be connected to your TV using an HDMI cable. Make sure you have an available HDMI port on your TV prior to ordering.
